overview: Ms. Gephart joined the Company in 1994 as the Manager of Human Resources. She earned a Bachelor of Business Administration degree from Western Michigan University and has been certified as a Senior Professional in Human Resources (SPHR) since 1996. Ms. Gephart is primarily responsible for all aspects of human resources and administration including compliance with employment laws / regulations, talent & performance management, professional development / training, compensation, benefits, employee relations, and corporate culture.

relationships.title: Vice President of Human Resources and Administration
